function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inequitable distribution of disease load among vulnerable populations","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and higher impact on vulnerable populations","Mitigation":"Improving access to healthcare, addressing social determinants of health, and implementing targeted public health interventions","Technologies":"Telemedicine, data analytics for targeted interventions, and mobile health clinics","People":"Vulnerable populations in low- and middle-income countries","Owner":"Public health organizations, governments, and international agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of resources and expertise for COVID-19 surveillance in low/middle-income countries","Impact":"Limited ability to detect and control disease spread, leading to prolonged pandemic impact","Mitigation":"Support for technology transfer, financial assistance, and capacity-building in low/middle-income countries","Technologies":"Web-based data reporting tools, open data platforms, and remote monitoring systems","People":"Healthcare professionals, public health officials, and communities in low/middle-income countries","Owner":"International agencies, public health organizations, and governments"},{"Description":"Inadequate vaccination coverage and acceptance in local communities","Impact":"Prolonged presence and spread of COVID-19, hindering global control and elimination efforts","Mitigation":"Developing and implementing strategies for global vaccination coverage, addressing vaccine hesitancy, and ensuring equitable access to vaccines","Technologies":"Vaccine distribution networks, community education platforms, and vaccination management systems","People":"Local communities, healthcare workers, and global population","Owner":"Public health authorities, pharmaceutical companies, and international health organizations"}]}
